title: [Base of Tower Hill]
description: The grassy hillside rises steeply to the east, dotted with moss-covered stones and hillocks.  A narrow track follows the curve of the hill in an upward spiral to the southeast.  Another path, little more than a deeper shadow in the grass, winds northeast toward a dark cut in the hillside.

The grassy hillside rises steeply to the east, dotted with moss-covered stones and hillocks.  A narrow track follows the curve of the hill in an upward spiral to the southeast.  Another path, hardly more than a shadow in the grass, winds northeast toward a cut in the hillside.
